page.title: 02AN ORDINARY DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: At the beginning of a day I get up and open my curtains and go downstairs. I read the paper and then have my breakfast of cornflakes milk and sugar. Then I feed my cat and fish. Then I get dressed and put my shoes on, clean my teeth and comb my hair. Then I look at the post. Usually I go for my friend and play on his Spectrum computer or play on his skateboard or I do some gardening in my garden. At about 12.30 if I am at my friend's I come home and have my dinner of sometimes spaghetti or pizza. Then I have a drink and play out again. Sometimes I play snooker where you knock balls into a pocket. On a green table with pockets. Then I have my tea and play games until 9.00 - bedtime.
